• File must be in CSV format.

  • Attribute validity will not be enforced.

ResourceImportInstructions:
• File must be in CSV format with UTF-8 encoding.
  • Status options are Available, Unavailable, or Hidden.
  • Color should be specified as the hex value. ex) #ffffff.
  • Comma separate multiple resource groups or resource relationships.
  • Durations must be specified in the format #d#h#m (1d3h30m for 1 day, 3 hours, 30 minutes).
  • Credit Applicability can be either 'per slot' or 'per reservation'.
  • Release Action options are Delete or End.
  • Export the resources or use the template as an example.
ReservationImportInstructions:
• File must be in CSV format with UTF-8 encoding.
  • Email, resource names, begin, and end are required fields.
  • Begin and end require full date time. Recommended format is YYYY-mm-dd HH:mm (2017-12-31 20:30).
  • Rules, conflicts, and valid time slots will not be checked.
  • Notifications will not be sent.
  • Attribute validity will not be enforced.
  • Comma separate multiple resource names.
  • Use the supplied template as an example.

GroupsImportInstructions:
• File must be in CSV format.
  • Name is required.
  • Member lists should be comma separated lists of emails.
  • Empty member lists when updating groups will leave members unchanged.
  • Permissions lists should be comma separated lists of resource names.
  • Empty permissions lists when updating groups will leave permissions unchanged.
  • Use the supplied template as an example.
